DataElement.preferredName: Person Preoperative Endocrine Prognostic Index Pathologic Tumor Stage Type
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The type of pathologic tumor stage points for information relating to the preoperative (occurring during the period immediately before a surgical operation) endocrine (collective designation for those tissues capable of secreting hormones) prognostic (having value for making predictions) index (a numerical scale used to compare variables with one another or with some reference number).

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information relating to the preoperative (occurring during the period immediately before a surgical operation) endocrine (collective designation for those tissues capable of secreting hormones) prognostic (having value for making predictions) index (a numerical scale used to compare variables with one another or with some reference number).

Property.preferredDefinition: Relating to or occurring during the period immediately before a surgical operation. :Collective designation for those tissues capable of secreting hormones.:Having value for making predictions.:Index; a numerical scale used to compare variables with one another or with some reference number.

Concepts.definition: Relating to or occurring during the period immediately before a surgical operation.
Collective designation for those tissues capable of secreting hormones.
A numerical scale used to compare variables with one another or with some reference number; a number used to select an element of a list, vector, array or other sequence.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: indication of the presence and extent of disease.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Preoperative Endocrine Prognostic Index Pathologic Tumor Stage Type
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Pathologic T stage is pT3 or pT4

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Pathologic T stage is pT3 or pT4

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Pathologic T stage is pT0, pTis, pT1, or pT2

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Pathologic T stage is pT0, pTis, pT1, or pT2

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Type; a subdivision of a particular kind of thing.
